title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.123 - Access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.123 - Access to records

State Regulations

The department and its representatives shall have access at all times to all orders, prescriptions or records required to be kept under article 33 of the Public Health Law and this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
80.123

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
